title: Level 6 Master Yi | Rate my Build
body:
does anyone know what score you need to get for a S-, i would amuse it would be a pretty good score since Yi is the kind of champ to snow ball but i haven't seen many Yis lately and when i do they tend to have around 10 deaths


Also just hear me out on this build,
{{item:3091}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3025}}{{item:3022}} {{item:3124}}  {{item:3068}} 
The wits end for some magic damage and the iceborn and mallet for chase utility and tankyness the sunfire because its over tuned berserkers and guinsoos for the obvious synergy with on hit and attack speed, its not the best build but i think its viable in ranked

replies.body:
Who really cares? You missed an important point, who you were playing against when you made this build?

Iceborn is quite useless on Yi for ANY situation, you don't have enough skills to make the proc, therefore wasting an item slot for something that could do a Yi more.

I would say for whatever reason or whoever you were up against in this build, swap Iceborn for some Lifesteal and maybe the Wits for some Penetration. Or think about getting Smite regardless of lane or jungle, getting {{item:1419}} or running no smite stock standard {{item:3153}}, or even both since they are different passives and do stack, or should, I haven't really tested it yet.

As for your S scorecard, that is irrelevant also, you cannot know what score is minimum, it depends on how all other players in that lane with that champion are playing on the same server, so it is a forever changing score.

{{item:1419}}  this is something you want, because it does so much, and anything but jungle yi is asking not to get an S.

{{item:3025}}  is a terrible item for Yi cause you barely get the passive, especially if your running {{item:3022}}  because slows don't stack (how have people not learned this yet?).
i just got S with the build i suggested but i swapped the mallet for a thorn, the build isn't meant to be super serious just a unique team fight esq build
Include a dead man's instead of Sunfire Cape, and ditch the Iceborn because Frozen Mallet is better and get some more damage or perhaps a Steraks or another on hit item.
